title: Can anyone help me find this font?
author: Primehunter

comments.content: Nothing really specific and as the red italic looks like to be [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724090531/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/helvetica), you could go with it as well for 'ADIAN'.
Hmm...its not Helvetica. I did try that one...Can anyone chance a guess?

Try Myriad Pro (Semibold SemiExtended) Adobe  
or Syntax / Bitstream Humanist 531 (Bitstream version of Syntax)
